TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XPathBinder extends System.Object

summary.span: 为应用程序快速开发 (RAD) 设计器提供支持，以便分析使用 XPath 表达式的数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Provides support for rapid application development (RAD) designers to parse data-binding expressions that use XPath expressions.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可使用重载方法的此类，以绑定到对实现的对象执行的 XPath 表达式的结果接口，如。You can use the overloaded method of this class to bind to the result of an XPath expression executed against an object that implements the interface, such as an . 可以使用方法来检索对执行的 XPath 表达式的结果对象作为节点的列表。You can use the method to retrieve the results of an XPath expression executed against an object as an list of nodes. 可直接枚举或分配给此节点的列表`DataSource`属性的列表控件，如或。This list of nodes can be enumerated directly or assigned to the `DataSource` property of a list control, such as a or . 使用时，可以使用数据绑定语法的简化的版本方法声明的方式。You can use a simplified version of data-binding syntax when using the methods declaratively. 而不是调用`XPathBinder.Eval`(`Container.DataItem`， `xpath`) 可以使用`XPath`(`xpath`)。Instead of calling `XPathBinder.Eval`(`Container.DataItem`, `xpath`) you can use `XPath`(`xpath`). 同样，而不是调用`XPathBinder.Select`(`Container.DataItem`，`xpath`)，可以使用`XPathSelect`(`xpath`) 来检索的节点集。Similarly, instead of calling `XPathBinder.Select`(`Container.DataItem`,`xpath`), you can use `XPathSelect`(`xpath`) to retrieve an set of nodes. 使用此简化的语法中，当并方法假定默认值`Container.DataItem`上下文对象。When using this simplified syntax, the and methods assume a default `Container.DataItem` context object. 有关数据绑定到 ASP.NET 服务器控件的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information about data binding to ASP.NET server controls, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有模板化控件控件来显示 XML 数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display XML data. 此示例包含两个部分：This example has two parts: - 显示 XML 数据的 Web 窗体页面。A Web Forms page that displays XML data. - 包含数据的 XML 文件。An XML file that contains the data. 该示例的第一部分显示了一个显示通过访问 XML 数据的 Web 窗体页面控件。The first part of the example shows a Web Forms page that displays XML data accessed through an control. 一个控件使用简化方法语法以绑定到 XML 中的数据项的文档表示。A control uses simplified method syntax to bind to data items within the XML document that the represents. 它使用方法来检索列表并将其分配为后期绑定属性控件。It uses the method to retrieve an list and assign it as a late-bound property for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14/CS/xmlds14cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14/VB/xmlds14vb.aspx#1)] 第二个示例提供了 XML 文件，Order.xml，如上文所定义的 Web 窗体页中显示的数据源使用。The second example provides the XML file, Order.xml, that is used as the source of the data displayed in the Web Forms page defined above. ``` John Doe 1234 Tenth Avenue Bellevue Washington 98001 screwdriver hammer fixture ```

summary.span: 在运行时对 对象分析和计算 XPath 数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Parses and evaluates an XPath data-binding expression against an object at run time.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Eval (object container, string xPath);
.method public static hidebysig object Eval(object container, string xPath) cil managed
Public Shared Function Eval (container As Object, xPath As String) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ Eval(System::Object ^ container, System::String ^ xPath);
static member Eval : obj * string -> obj

param.name: container
param.span: 计算表达式所根据的 对象引用。

span.span: The object reference that the expression is evaluated against.

param.span: 此标识符必须是以页的指定语言表示的有效对象标识符。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: xPath
param.span: 从 到放置在绑定控件属性中的属性值的 XPath 查询。

span.span: The XPath query from to the property value that is placed in the bound control property.

summary.span: 在运行时计算 XPath 数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Evaluates XPath data-binding expressions at run time.

returns.span: 一个 ，它是数据绑定表达式的计算结果。

span.span: An that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用方法以声明方式如果你想要简化到要在浏览器上显示的文本字符串的 XML 节点的转换。You can use the method declaratively if you want to simplify the casting of an XML node to a text string to be displayed on a browser. 若要执行此操作，必须将放\<%# 和 %> 标记，也使用标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定，在数据绑定表达式中。To do so, you must place the \<%# and %> tags, which are also used in standard ASP.NET data binding, around the data-binding expression. 对于任何列表 ASP.NET 服务器控件，如， ，或，则`container`参数应为`Container.DataItem`。For any of the list ASP.NET server controls, such as , , or , the `container` parameter should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果要针对页上，进行绑定`container`参数应为`Page`。If you are binding against the page, the `container` parameter should be `Page`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有模板化控件控件来显示 XML 数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display XML data. 此示例包含两个部分：This example has two parts: - 显示 XML 数据的 Web 窗体页面。A Web Forms page that displays XML data. - 包含数据的 XML 文件。An XML file that contains the data. 该示例的第一部分显示了一个显示通过访问 XML 数据的 Web 窗体页面控件。The first part of the example shows a Web Forms page that displays XML data accessed through an control. 一个控件使用简化方法语法以绑定到 XML 中的数据项的文档表示。A control uses the simplified method syntax to bind to data items within the XML document that the represents. 它使用方法来检索列表并将其分配为后期绑定属性控件。It uses the method to retrieve an list and assign it as a late-bound property for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_13#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_13/CS/xmlds13cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_13#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_13/VB/xmlds13vb.aspx#1)] 第二个示例提供了 XML 文件，Bookstore2.xml，如上文所定义的 Web 窗体页中显示的数据源使用。The second example provides the XML file, Bookstore2.xml, that is used as the source of the data displayed in the Web Forms page defined above. ``` test test2 The Handmaid's Tale 12.95 test3 test4 Pride And Prejudice 24.95 ```

param.span: .NET Framework 格式字符串，类似于 所用的字符串，可以将 对象（是数据绑定表达式的计算结果）转换为可由请求浏览器显示的 。

summary.span: 在运行时计算 XPath 数据绑定表达式，并将结果格式化为要在请求浏览器中显示的文本。

span.span: Evaluates XPath data-binding expressions at run time and formats the result as text to be displayed in the requesting browser.

returns.span: ，通过计算数据绑定表达式并转换为字符串类型得出。

span.span: A that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression and conversion to a string type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解有关.NET Framework 中的格式字符串的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。To learn more about format strings in the .NET Framework, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 可以使用方法以声明方式如果你想要简化到要在浏览器中显示的文本字符串的 XML 节点的转换。You can use the method declaratively if you want to simplify the casting of an XML node to a text string to be displayed in a browser. 若要执行此操作，必须将放\<%# 和 %> 标记，也使用标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定，在数据绑定表达式中。To do so, you must place the \<%# and %> tags, which are also used in standard ASP.NET data binding, around the data-binding expression. 对于任何列表 ASP.NET 服务器控件，如， ，或，则`container`参数应为`Container.DataItem`。For any of the list ASP.NET server controls, such as , , or , the `container` parameter should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果要针对页上，进行绑定`container`参数应为`Page`。If you are binding against the page, the `container` parameter should be `Page`.

summary.span: 使用指定用来解析 XPath 表达式中的命名空间前缀的 对象，在运行时评估 XPath 数据绑定表达式，并将结果格式化为文本以便显示在请求浏览器中。

span.span: Evaluates XPath data-binding expressions at run time and formats the result as text to be displayed in the requesting browser, using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes in the XPath expression.

returns.span: ，它是数据绑定表达式的计算结果。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用方法以声明方式如果你想要简化到要在浏览器中显示的文本字符串的 XML 节点的转换。You can use the method declaratively if you want to simplify the casting of an XML node to a text string to be displayed in a browser. 若要执行此操作，必须将放\<%# 和 %> 标记，也使用标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定，在数据绑定表达式中。To do so, you must place the \<%# and %> tags, which are also used in standard ASP.NET data binding, around the data-binding expression. 数据绑定表达式中包含的 XPath 表达式和对象解析命名空间引用。The data-binding expression includes the XPath expression and an object to resolve the namespace reference. 对于任何列表 ASP.NET 服务器控件，如， ，或，则`container`参数应为`Container.DataItem`。For any of the list ASP.NET server controls, such as , , or , the `container` parameter should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果要针对页上，进行绑定`container`参数应为`Page`。If you are binding against the page, the `container` parameter should be `Page`.
